description: The Lozano Fleece in jogger form, this is the perfect pant for paradise-level softness. Made from a recycled polyester + Tencel fabric blend for next-to-skin comfort, it also features thoughtful details—like an external drawcord, slim fit, and a faux fly—that take it to the higher levels of lounge style. Pair with your Lozano Fleece for a full kit.
name: Cotopaxi Lozano Joggers - Mens
